Class SaslQopHandler

java.lang.Object
io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter

org.infinispan.server.core.transport.SaslQopHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandler
public class SaslQopHandler extends io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageDecoder implements io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandler
Handles QOP of the SASL protocol.
